content:
It's wonderful, fireworks are amazing!
Once they burst in the sky, everyone becomes so happy.
       <size=30>I should stock up more, so everyone can enjoy fireworks whenever they want...</size>

content:

from Captain Mo about
how to be a proper Astralink coordinator...

content:

<size=30>not "in behalf of," huh?</size>

But the fireworks are so pretty, wow...
